name: Patch-based Forensics (CNN)
description: Uses CNN classifiers on small image patches to detect local manipulations. Each patch is independently classified, creating a manipulation probability map.

references.title: Chai, L. et al. (2020). What Makes Fake Images Detectable? Understanding Properties that Generalize. ECCV.
Wang, S.Y. et al. (2020). CNN-Generated Images Are Surprisingly Easy to Spot...For Now. CVPR.
